name: Chaos Factory
description:
This game was made during Brains Eden 2019 from team Beta Bots from SAE under the theme Chain Reaction.

Lead Programmer 

Connor Swannell (me)

Programmers

Adam Hajdu

Viktoria Berta

Artist

Wojciech Zurowski

Audio

Allen Lindenberg

This game is a controller only, Where you have to pick up the colour orbs in order matching your code.  If you get all three correct then you get a second and then eventually third code, If you get all three codes correct then you win.

To stop the second player from winning you can shoot them into other orbs making them have to wait for the correct one to re spawn. You can also shoot them off to slow them down.

Tips:

You don't know if you got it wrong you have to enter the whole code.

If all orbs are spawned and your colour is not there then you have to pick up one and wait for the correct one to spawn (picking up a new orb replaces the old one).
